thread.title: Rejoice! Justin Bieber is returning to Instagram
thread.title_full: Rejoice! Justin Bieber is returning to Instagram

author: USATODAY
title: Rejoice! Justin Bieber is returning to Instagram
text:
Rejoice! Justin Bieber is returning to Instagram Maeve McDermott , USATODAY 4:47 p.m. ET Feb. 3, 2017 
Justin Bieber's fans are waiting with open arms for his Instagram to return. (Photo: Kevin Winter, Getty Images for iHeartMedia) 
Never say never. 
Last year, much to the chagrin of his millions of Instagram followers, Justin Bieber deleted, then reactivated, and then finally quit the photo-sharing service for good. his account, and then finally quitting for good, But after a five-month hiatus, he's giving his least favorite social media platform another shot. 
Bieber's beloved Instagram account is returning on Friday, ahead of his appearance in T-Mobile's Super Bowl ads, the cellphone company announced. 
The 22-year-old singer is starring in T-Mobile's #UnlimitedMoves campaign for his upcoming spot, where he dons a tux to show off some moves of his own. My #SuperBowl commercial w/ @TMobile . Let’s go!! Let me see those #UnlimitedMoves https://t.co/J3YYPkR9nw — Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) February 2, 2017 
The last time Bieber was on Instagram, he was embroiled in a feud with his former flame Selena Gomez, which her fans dubbed the #SelenaEndedJustinParty . But, since T-Mobile is fulfilling Bieber's 2015 wish to appear in a Super Bowl ad, the singer is returning the favor, reviving his account for his fans. 
Keep an eye on @justinbieber to see when it reactivates. I want a super bowl commercial :) — Justin Bieber (@justinbieber) December 10, 2015 Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2l1gWZY Most Popular
